attributes.action: instruct mediation be ordered by a court before any court action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
family mediation regarding children and contact needs to be ordered by a court before having to apply for a contact order .
i propose for an affordable fee paid to the court by the person taking out the order mediation to be enforced,

so that when the actual meeting is arranged it will by law make mediation less avoidable and ensure the invited party actually attends the meeting and that any arrangement is adhered to,
and/or court action will follow and that non attendance of mediation be used against that party in any following court action/ or contact order that is applied for .

at present it is to easy for a party to simply " not attend " incuring that court action has to follow ,

this i believe will go some way to helping the system and that court may not have to be attended,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
